page.title: 08CLUBS
page.content: IT IS QUITE COMMON FOR PEOPLE TO BELONG TO A CLUB,THERE ARE A GREAT NUMBER OF DIFFERENT CLUBS FOR PEOPLE TO CHOOSE.CHILDREN OFTEN JOIN THE { {CUBS OR SCOUTS}(boys only)OR THE {BROWNIES OR GUIDES}(girls only).ADULTS OFTEN BELONG TO WORKING MENS CLUBS IN OUR AREA THERE IS THE BATCHLEY CLUB, THIS HAS A BAR AND GAMES ROOM.LARGE FIRMS OFTEN HAVE THEIR OWN CLUBS, (HIGH DUTY ALLOYS)HAS A SPORTS AND SOCIAL CLUB IN OUR AREA.OTHER LOCAL CLUBS INCLUDE{BMX}(bicycle riding),{SWIMMING,FISHING,CHORAL {SOCIETY,ORIENTEERING,JUDO,}AND MANY OTHERS.THERE ARE SPECIAL CLUBS FOR PEOPLE WITH SOME FORM OF HANDICAP SOME EXAMPLES ARE THE{STROKE CLUB,A {CLUB FOR THE PARTIALLY SIGHTED},AND MANY OTHERS
